amendment.description: Amendment provides funding to support the Intimate Partner Violence Strategy at the Health Resources and Services Administration across the relevant bureaus at the agency.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 66 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to provide funding to support the Intimate Partner Violence Strategy at the Health Resources and Services Administration across the relevant bureaus at the agency.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Porter amendment (A063) Agreed to by recorded vote: 311 - 110 (Roll no. 312).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Porter amendment (A063) Agreed to by recorded vote: 311 - 110 (Roll no. 312).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A063) offered by Ms. Porter.
